publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-221.1 Mr Alex Salmond: Domestic Violenceâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-221) in the name of Ms Wendy Alexander, at end insert "while at the same time recognising that a national strategy which includes public education and prevention programmes, shelter and support services and law enforcement initiatives remains an essential part of the campaign." Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*, Fiona Hyslop*
